description: Try our easy to follow Stir-fried Tofu, Rice, Asian Greens, Lime & Soy recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Stir-fry,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Vegetarian,Rice,Vegan,Tofu,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Stir-fried Tofu, Rice, Asian Greens, Lime & Soy Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook rice in a medium saucepan of boiling water according to packet instructions, or until al dente. Drain well, set aside.

Heat a large wok over a high heat, spray with oil. Add the tofu, stir fry for 2 minutes or until golden, remove from wok and set aside. Add onion, stir fry for 2 minutes or until golden. Add garlic and ginger, stir fry for 30 seconds or until aromatic. Add gai lan and capsicum, stir fry for 2 minutes or until vegetables are almost tender.
Add rice, lime juice and kecap manis. Toss together for 1-2 minutes, or until everything is well combined and rice is heated through.
